content:
I'm loving The Morning Show so far! The characters are all complex and multi-dimensional, and I appreciate how the show tackles tough topics without being too preachy. I'm especially enjoying Jennifer Aniston's performance as Alex Levy - she's so nuanced and relatable.

As for Apple TV+, I'm still on the fence about it. I think the original content is great, but the selection is still a bit limited compared to other streaming services. That being said, I'm willing to give it a chance since they're investing in high-quality shows like The Morning Show. Plus, the video quality is amazing - it's been a game-changer for my commute!

What about you - have you checked out any other Apple TV+ shows? I've been meaning to try out For All Mankind, but I haven't had a chance yet.
